timeline.headline: Stiffnes And Friction Paper review
timeline.text: Selection of the most relevant primary studies

date.headline: A. Girard et al.
date.text:
Haptip: Displaying haptic shear forces at the fingertips for multi-finger interaction in virtual environments.

Wearable: Yes   Fingertip: Not Free

Friction: Yes    Stiffness: Yes

Actuator: 2 DC Motors - Tactor

Environment: VR

date.headline: C. Pacchierotti et al.
date.text:
The hRing: a wearable haptic device to avoid occlusions in hand tracking.

Wearable: Yes   Fingertip: Free

Friction: Yes    Stiffness: Yes

Actuator: 2 Servos - Belts

Environment: VR

date.headline: M. Maisto et al.
date.text:
Evaluation of wearable haptic systems for the fingers in augmented reality applications

Wearable: Yes   Fingertip: Not Free

Friction: Yes    Stiffness: Yes

Actuator: 3 Servos - Revolut and 2 Servos - Belts

Environment: AR

date.headline: H. Culbertson and K. Kuchenbecker.
date.text:
Ungrounded haptic augmented reality system for displaying roughness and friction.

Wearable: Ungrounded   Fingertip: Not Free

Friction: Yes    Stiffness: No

Actuator: Proxy - Stylus

Environment: Desktop

date.headline: De Tinguy et al.
date.text:
Enhancing the Stiffness Perception of Tangible Objects in Mixed Reality Using Wearable Haptics.

Wearable: Yes   Fingertip: Free

Friction: No    Stiffness: Yes

Actuator:2 Servos - Belts

Environment: AR + Tangible

date.headline: Meli, L. et al.

date.text:

Friction: No    Stiffness: Yes
